## Installation


```r
install.packages("devtools") #If you don't already have devtools installed

devtools::install_github("morgansleeper/SailorMoonR")
```


![](luna.gif)


## Using SailorMoonR

```{r, usage1}
#Load SailorMoonR
library(SailorMoonR)
```

__Functions:__  

* `MoonPaletteEnumeration`: list all available palettes
* `MoonPaletteIllumination()`: generate a sample swatch for a palette
* `inthenameofthemoon()`: use a palette (by having it return its color values)

```{r, usage2, fig.height=1, fig.width=5}
# See all available palettes
MoonPaletteEnumeration

# See a sample swatch for a palette
MoonPaletteIllumination("MoonPrismPower")
# Use a palette
inthenameofthemoon("MoonPrismPower")
```

## Examples

```{r, examples.data, include=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
locs <- (read.csv(textConnection("Long,Lat,Name,Type
                                 139.737446,35.655775,Ichi-no-hashi Archway,Landmark
                                 139.735494,35.654524,Amishiro Park,Park
                                 139.731073,35.652894,Hikawa Jinja Shrine,Shrine
                                 139.745447,35.65861,Tokyo Tower,Landmark
                                 139.726296,35.651252,Arisugawa-no-Miya Memorial Park,Park
                                 139.732962,35.656392,Kurayami-zaka,POI")))
locs$Type <- factor(locs$Type, levels=c("Shrine","POI","Park","Landmark"))

pal <- colorFactor(palette = (col=(inthenameofthemoon("MoonPrismPower"))), domain = locs$Type)
```

```{r}
leaflet(locs, width=800, height=430) %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron) %>%
  addMarkers(label=~Name, popup=~Name) %>%
  addCircles(radius=150, weight=1, color=~pal(Type), fillOpacity = .4) %>%
  addLegend("topright", pal = pal, values = ~locs$Type, title = "Location type", opacity = .4) %>%
  addMiniMap("bottomright", width=100, height=100, tiles = providers$CartoDB.Positron, toggleDisplay = TRUE)
```
